Package de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images

Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible images.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AlternativeTextForAreaOfImageMapRule AlternativeTextForAreaOfImageMapRule ensures that every area of an image map created by the <area/> tag within the given HTML document provides an alternative text through its alt attribute.
AlternativeTextForImageRule AlternativeTextForImageRule ensures that every image created by the <img/> tag within the given HTML document provides an alternative text through it's alt attribute.
AlternativeTextForLinkedImageRule AlternativeTextForLinkedImageRule ensures that every image created by the <img/> tag within the given HTML document that is part of a hyperlink created by the <a/> tag provides a non empty alternative text through it's alt attribute.
AvoidServerSideImageMapRule AvoidServerSideImageMapRule ensures that there are no server side image maps created by the <img ismap="ismap"/> tag within the given HTML document because they are inaccessible by users who cannot use a mouse because of some disability.
 

Package de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.images Description

Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible images.
